pkgmetadata.longdescription: Some Latent Variable Models // Includes some procedures for latent variable modeling with a particular focus on multilevel data. The 'LAM' package contains mean and covariance structure modelling for multivariate normally distributed data (mlnormal(); Longford, 1987; doi:10.1093/biomet/74.4.817), a general Metropolis-Hastings algorithm (amh(); Roberts Rosenthal, 2001, doi:10.1214/ss/1015346320) and penalized maximum likelihood estimation (pmle(); Cole, Chu Greenland, 2014; doi:10.1093/aje/kwt245).
